climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: ECO-FRIENDLY CLEANING POWER: Concentrated Laundry Liquid works on all your laundry, from high-tech fabrics to delicates, washing away smells, stains, and left-behind residue from previous detergents.

HYPOALLERGENIC: Washing soda and powerful, natural ingredients work together to rinse fabrics completely and leave nothing on your clothes (when used as directed). The fragrance free formula is ideal for those with sensitive skin and will not cover stains or odors with artificial brighteners or perfumes. Safe for hand washing.

CLOTH DIAPER FRIENDLY: This detergent is safe to use on baby fabrics, effectively deep cleaning cloth diapers and other baby clothes between wears. The power of a professional laundry detergent with a formula gentle enough for baby clothing.
LESS IS MORE: Each bottle contains just four ingredients and one ounce per dose. No suds, just a deep clean that leaves fabric fresh and soft.

EPA SAFER CHOICE CERTIFIED: Charlie’s Soap laundry soap is certified safer for the environment and is septic safe. The eco-friendly clothing detergent formula also helps remove fats, oils, greases, and odors from sewer lines, saving your town money and water.
body.description: The secret to a happy life with clean clothes while doing your share for Mother Earth shouldn't be complicated. Use our concentrated Laundry Liquid detergent. It deep cleans your laundry for only pennies per wash (one ounce per large load), as it removes trapped odors and stains. Hypoallergenic, non-toxic, safer for the environment. Plus, it removes residues from your previous detergent. No need for fabric softener, either. Septic safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this stuff - great for sensitive skin and noses
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough about this soap. I've tried so many other detergents for sensitive skin and none of them compare with this soap. It doesn't gum up the machine, there are no dyes, and it works for HE machines. One ounce is enough for a full load of king sheets + more.Clothes come out softer and "fresh" - not perfume fresh, but clean fresh. Sometimes it's almost like hanging your laundry outside to dry. I have stopped using dryer sheets and only use my Nellie's wool dryer balls without static over this past winter. My towels love it and "perked up" with like-new absorption. I have many allergies and sensitivities including being allergic to my dog. I wash everything from the pet blankets to my delicates in this detergent as a "one-stop-shop" and it works great. I can tell when I've washed the pet blankets as my asthma is calmed and skin irritations don't occur when I come into contact.I do use an old smaller detergent bottle from another brand. I refill that smaller bottle and get an easy and accurate pour into the marked cap. What used to be a "small load" for that detergent's pour measurement is a large load for Charlie's soap at a single ounce.I have tried Nellie's Laundry Soda powder and it didn't seem to dissolve well. I've read similar complaints from other reviewers about Charlie's powder version gumming up their sewage hoses. No troubles like that here with the liquid. Buy the gallon to reduce the environmental impact of shipping multiple smaller bottles, and love your laundry again.If you've made it this far, you can feel my enthusiasm. I shared the last bit of my bottle with a family member to help them understand how great it is for sensitive skin and non-sensitive skin. I hope this was helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars our only laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's more safe than most. There's no heavy scents that I'm allergic to. Clothes come out clean. For my grease stains I use Spray and wash and throw it in and it comes out clean as a whistle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order was so fast........
reviews.reviewText: I am so thankful you carry this brand, best, easiest, safest, and cleans fantastic.....I also use the bleach, and it's safe to use on colors as well, just adds a boost to the laundry soap.. Won't use anything else....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No scent, works well
reviews.reviewText: We have been using Charlie's soap for several years. We use both the powder and the liquid. My husband prefers the liquid. It works well and most importantly to us--it has no scent or other odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great laundry soap
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a natural, eco friendly, fragrance free soap for doing laundry, but I was a little concerned about its effectiveness. I am so pleasantly surprised! First of all, it produces lots of suds with only an ounce or two of soap. And it rinses completely clean. It leaves no residue or smell of any kind. I never realized before just how much other products affect clothing, towels, sheets, etc. It's economical as a little goes a long way. I will use this from now on and I hope everyone will give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this detergent!! I originally bought because I had a smaller bottle of Tyler Laundry Detergent and wanted to make it last longer. I started doing a few loads with this to get some off the top to pour the Tyler in the bottle. It cleaned our clothes really well!! My boyfriend farms and when he’s not farming he’s hunting. This got out a lot of grease and hard stains!! I ended up not pouring the detergent in there and will definitely buy more when it’s out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, careless shipping
reviews.reviewText: Great product but…The product leaked during shipment. The felt washer that they use in the cap isn’t effective. The product should seal better, and the cap should be reinforced with packing tape for shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I finally found a laundry detergent that is free of yuck and works well. I love that my clothes just smell clean. I decided not to pretreat a pair of jeans with mud all over them, and they came out clean.
Love this stuff! Great value and clean and non toxic

reviews.reviewTitle: Clothes smell and look clean without the fragrance and other nasties!
reviews.reviewText: Love this soap. We started using it, as we are expecting a baby in the next few weeks. Didn't want our little one blasted with nasty chemicals and fragrance, and this soap has worked wonders! I also use it as a spot treatment, and it's been great at removing grease and tomato sauce. The clothes come out smelling fresh because they are CLEAN! We also use Eco Max Hypoallergenic Fabric Softener (also no nasties) to help keep the clothes soft. Great combo. Considering you only use 1 or 2 ounces, depending on the wash size, the soap lasts a good amount of time. Worth the few extra bucks to feel confident in the ingredients. Charlie's Soap for the win!

reviews.reviewTitle: One of the best detergents on the market
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several detergents over the years and I can say this is one of the bests considering quality vs priceIt is fragrance-free, and its quality is above expectations. I don't have to use the stain remover so much as before and the clothes are clean with no residues. I have a skin allergy and this is the detergent that doesn't irritate my skin.I highly recommend it to everyone. I will definitely use Charlie's soap for the years to come.
No scent. Very satisfied with this product. Removed dirt and smells from my kids clothing. Love it!
I don't want ppl to like this soap...I don't want it to get sold out.This is awesome stuff!!! Been using it for years.
